action_description: Changes the brightness level of the selected WeMo light. If the light is off it will turn on with selected brightness level.

action: Set sleep fader for a group of lights
action_description: Sets sleep fader time for the selected group of WeMo lights.
Turns on the selected WeMo light. If it is already on it stays on.
Changes the brightness level of the selected group of WeMo lights. If the group is off it will turn on with selected brightness level.
Turns off the selected WeMo light. If it is already off it stays off.

action: Turn off a group of lights
action_description: Turns off the selected group of WeMo lights. If the group is already off it will remain off.

action: Turn on a group of lights
action_description: Turns on the selected group of WeMo lights. If the group is already on it will remain on.
Starts sleep fader for the selected WeMo light.
